review.reviewBody:
Thank You!!
Silver Dragon!!
AMAZING  Dinner For One / 單人晚餐 (Any Three Items / 任選三樣) 
9. Wonton Soup / 雲吞湯 Delicious! 
Spring 2. Spring Roll / 素春卷 
crunchy  and Fresh!!
Only thingSweet Sour Sauce.. Is Much Enjoyedwith Deep fried  Prawns Thank You
Very Delicious!
This is the freshest tastiest keadtgfeasy Chinese in town
this food was disgusting, the eggeoll was just a gelatinous goo...the sweet&sour pork was all fat and the fried rice and chicken chowmein were very very average at best.
this batch was especially well cooked. when you cook this well, what more can you ask for.
